item.title: data exfiltration over SSL with srvdir
item.description: Every now and then I come across some application that may (or may not) have been developed with penetration testing in mind but it ends up being damn helpful all the same. Yesterday I found a post about srvdir which is designed to share content over SSL/TLS via a public site. When trying to exfiltrate data from a client site I normally spend a lot of time setting up tunnels, using disposable A records from afraid.
